pages.text: The $(mob)Redcap Goblin$() is a monster found undeground in the $(thing)Twilight Forest$(). It tries to get in melee range to attack players on sight. Unlike monsters such as $(l:minecraft_zombie)$(mob)Zombies$(), it prefers circling its target in order to attack from the sides or the back.$(br2)It will also light up any nearby placed $(item)TNT$() that it can reach.
